#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long int count =0;
long long int b[100005],a[100005];
void merge(int low,int mid,int high)
{
    int i=low,k=low,j=mid+1;
    while(i<=mid&&j<=high)
    {
        if(a[i]<=a[j])
        {
            b[k]=a[i];
            i++;
            k++;
        }
        if(a[i]>a[j])
        {
            b[k]=a[j];
            k++;
            j++;
            count=count+(mid-i+1);
        }
    }
    while(i<=mid)
    {
        b[k]=a[i];
        k++;
        i++;
    }
    while(j<=high)
    {
        b[k]=a[j];
        k++;
        j++;
    }
    for(i=low;i<=high;i++)
        a[i]=b[i];
}
void mergesort(int low,int high)
{
    int mid=(low+high)/2;
    if(low<high)
    {
        mergesort(low,mid);
        mergesort(mid+1,high);
        merge(low,mid,high);
    }
    return;
}
int main()
{
    long long int t,i=1,n,j;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    for(j=0; j<n; j++)
      scanf("%lld",&a[j]);
    int low=0,high=n-1;
    mergesort(low,high);
    printf("%lld\n",count);
    return 0;
}
